data.name: 蛛火Spider fire
data.detailed_description:
This is a tank (spider car) shooting game. In the game, you will control a spider car to find the exit in the maze. Of course, you also need to find the key to open the exit. Some strange robots in the maze are not friendly to you. You can be in the box in the maze Find some props that will help you deal with the enemies in the maze.
When you click on the spider car, it can enter the shooting state, but the bullets you shoot are limited. Most of the time, you need to place mines to deal with the enemy. Your mines can be used infinitely.
When you find the key, you can enter the next level, but some exits require a bit of brain to reach.
The game is very interesting, I hope you can have a good time in the game!

data.short_description: This is a tank shooting game. You will control a spider car to find an exit in the maze. Of course, you need to find the key to open the exit. Some strange robots in the maze are not friendly to you. You can find some props in the boxes in the maze. They will help you deal with your enemies.
data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7，windows8,windows10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
